sense.def:
To touch something
pomeni nežno položiti prste ali roko na nekaj.

seg.quote: The metal is so hot I can't touch it.
He remembered the touch of her hand.

sense.def:
Kadar dve stvari
touch
, površini obeh prideta v neposreden stik.

seg.quote: Make sure that the wires are not touching.

sense.def:
One's touch
je človekov čut, s katerim je sposoben ugotoviti, kakšno je nekaj, če se tistega dotakne z rokami.

seg.quote: The skin was slightly waxy to the touch.

sense.def:
To be touched by something
pomeni biti žalosten, razumevajoč ali hvaležen zaradi nečesa.

seg.quote: I was touched by his thoughtfulness.

sense.def:
A touch
je podrobnost, ki jo nečemu dodamo, da tisto izboljšamo.

seg.quote: The final touches were put to their report.

sense.def:
A touch of something
je zelo majhna količina nečesa.

seg.quote: There was a touch of frost this morning.

sense.def:
To get in touch with someone
ali
to keep in touch with someone
pomeni nekomu pisati ali telefonirati.

cit.quote: navezati ali vzdrževati stike z nekom

seg.quote: Please drop in when you can. I'd like to keep in touch.

sense.def:
To lose touch with someone
pomeni postopoma prenehati pisati tistemu človeku, mu telefonirati ali ga obiskovati.

To be in touch with a subject or situation
pomeni poznati najnovejše podatke o neki tematiki ali razmerah.
To be out of touch with a subject or situation
pomeni, da je naše znanje o tistem zastarelo.

cit.quote: biti na tekočem, imeti stik; ne biti na tekočem, ne imeti več stika

seg.quote: I'm a bit out of touch with new developments.

sense.def:
Za tisto, kar je
touch and go
, nismo prepričani, ali se bo zgodilo oziroma uspelo.

Kadar letalo
touches down
, prileti na tla.

To touch on something
pomeni nekaj na kratko omeniti.

seg.quote: ...the topic which I touched on at the beginning of this chapter.
